title: Installing Error

Hey @berkantsoytas, people usually experience this issue when they are using npm 8 and don't have up to date build tools installed. On Windows, when installing Node there should be a checkbox that you need to check to install additional build tools. Can you try re-installing and ensuring you install these extra build tools?

Or as a quick workaround you can downgrade to npm version 6 (`npm install -g npm@6`) and try installing again.

I was able to solve this problem in node in two ways.

### first solution

I downgraded node version to 16.13.*

### second solution

I added the -m flag.

@berkantsoytas glad to see you were able to resolve your issue! Thank you so much for following up with what worked for you, as other users will be able to read this if they encounter something similar. I'm closing this issue for issue maintenance but please feel free to open another issue if something else comes up!
